Import Package Configuration

Source: R/pkg_config.R
import_config.Rd

Import package configuration data from a YAML or JSON file.

Usage

import_config(path, file_type = "yaml")

Arguments

path

character. Path to the configuration file. Must be a valid file path to an existing file.

file_type

character. The file type - must be either "yaml" or "json". Default: "yaml".

Value

A list containing the configuration data from the file.

Details

This function reads and validates a configuration file. The file must exist and contain valid YAML or JSON. If the file is malformed, a helpful error message will indicate the parsing issue.

See also

write_config, mk_pkg_from_config

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Import a YAML config
config <- import_config("my_config.yaml", "yaml")
print(config$pkg_name)

# Import a JSON config
config <- import_config("my_config.json", "json")
} # }
